Title: The Diary
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Jillian Tamaki, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: John DiMaggio, Clark Duke, Dan Mintz, Alia Shawkat
Plot: Jake's son T.V. discovers a mysterious diary in the dried-up moat of the Candy Kingdom, and becomes obsessed with finding out more about the writer known only as "B.P."
